name: BotTemplateIceCream

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
rm -rf /mnt/server
apt -y update
apt -y install wget unzip ffmpeg
mkdir -p /mnt/server/
chown -R root:root /mnt
cd /mnt/server/
wget https://github.com/SprrNetWRK/BotTemplate/archive/master.zip
unzip nodejsdefault
rm -rf nodejsdefault.zip

variables.name: Startup File
variables.description: Select a file to start your bot from!
